name: ReAn-X
description:
In the early stages of development, we have a small prototype for our project, called ReAn-X, a top-down tower defense shooter.

Use power to give your towers enough energy to function.

Use money to purchase your growing fortress.

A simple game made in java (you need it to play this awesome game). Tell us what would be a positive change to make the game better on:

twitter: @GnowBros
